definition: along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝怀铁路修建对沿线地区经济发展具有重要意义。

sentences.english: There was a rare whole eclipse of the sun had happened along the Yantze Rive, China this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午在中国长江沿线发生了一次罕见的日全蚀。

sentences.english: Firstly, the mechanisms of the corridor effects of the urban transport artery on land use are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 城市交通干道对沿线土地利用存在廊道效应。

sentences.english: Did you actually get taught by those directors somewhere along the line?
sentences.chinese: 那些沿线的导演真的教过你吗？

sentences.english: A string of coastal towns and villages were flattened by a tsunami triggered by the quake.
sentences.chinese: 沿线的海岸城市及乡村都被地震引起的海啸所填平。

sentences.english: People gathered along the train route to wave to the President-elect.
sentences.chinese: 人们聚集在铁路沿线像候选总统挥手致意。

sentences.english: It is said that about 10 000 policemen are posted along this section of the railway line.
sentences.chinese: 据说铁路沿线这一段布置着一万警力。

sentences.english: Stops along the route are candidates for new high-density housing, she says.
sentences.chinese: 轻轨沿线的停靠站将会是新建的高密度住宅区。

sentences.english: Please click the yellow hotspot to show nearby clinic.
sentences.chinese: 请点击黄色热点以显示沿线港铁站的脊医诊所。

sentences.english: Anchors must be moved ahead periodically as the barge progresses along the route.
sentences.chinese: 随船沿线路向前运动，必须不断地使船锚向前移动。

sentences.english: It also manages amenity plots and soft landscape along highways and roads.
sentences.chinese: 该局又护理市容地带及公路沿线的美化环境植物。

sentences.english: The new highway depresses business along the old road.
sentences.chinese: 新的公路抑制了旧道路沿线的商业。

sentences.english: We saw new factories and well-cultivated fields all along the line.
sentences.chinese: 铁路沿线到处可见新建的工厂和精耕细作的田地。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the sensitivity of Yersinia pestis along Qinghai-Tibet Railway.
sentences.chinese: 目的为了解青藏铁路沿线鼠疫菌对抗生素的敏感性。

sentences.english: Soft rock area distribute extensive at south area of Mountain Qin. Which Xikang railway go through.
sentences.chinese: 西康铁路沿线软质岩带在秦岭以南分布较广。

sentences.english: The path lies along the coast.

definition: along the sides of the road/by the wayside
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
multiple track (e.g. rail)/multi-lane (e.g. highway)/the complex line (math.)
along the river/the region around the river
